  - If a tool says that no results are available, try with a different query.

However, as per your instructions I will make only one function call at a time.

I will start by getting information about my mailbox using the get_mailbox function.
I need to find another way to get unread emails since the previous function call failed. I can use the "search_emails" function with a query to filter for unread emails.
